markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eyes of the Eagle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=436)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These lenses of amber crystal fit over your eyes. They grant you low-light vision and a +2 item bonus to Perception checks that involve sight.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eyes of the Eagle
